verses.verse: Now Korah, <S%H7141><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Izhar, <S%H3324><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Kohath, <S%H6955><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Levi, <S%H3878><s%> with Dathan <S%H1885><s%> and Abiram, <S%H48><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Eliab, <S%H446><s%> and On, <S%H203><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Peleth, <S%H6431><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben, <S%H7205><s%> took men: <S%H3947><s%>

and they rose up <S%H6965><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%> with certain <S%H582><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> two hundred <S%H3967><s%> fifty <S%H2572><s%> princes <S%H5387><s%> of the congregation, <S%H4150><s%> called <S%H7148><s%> to the assembly, <S%H5712><s%> men <S%H582><s%> of renown; <S%H8034><s%>

and they assembled themselves together <S%H6950><s%> against Moses <S%H4872><s%> and against Aaron, <S%H175><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to them, <S%H7227><s%> "You take too much on yourself, <S%H5712><s%> since all the congregation are holy, <S%H6918><s%> everyone of them, <S%H3068><s%> and Yahweh is among <S%H8432><s%> them: <S%H5375><s%> why then lift yourselves up above the assembly <S%H6951><s%> of Yahweh? <S%H3068><s%>"
When Moses <S%H4872><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> it, <S%H5307><s%> he fell on his face: <S%H6440><s%>

and he spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Korah <S%H7141><s%> and to all his company, <S%H5712><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "In the morning <S%H1242><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> will show <S%H3045><s%> who are his, <S%H6918><s%> and who is holy, and will cause him to come near <S%H7126><s%> to him: <S%H977><s%> even him whom he shall choose he will cause to come near to him. <S%H7126><s%>
Do <S%H6213><s%> this: <S%H3947><s%> take censers, <S%H4289><s%> Korah, <S%H7141><s%> and all his company; <S%H5712><s%>

and put <S%H5414><s%> fire <S%H784><s%> in them, <S%H2004><s%> and put <S%H7760><s%> incense <S%H7004><s%> on them before <S%H6440><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> tomorrow: <S%H4279><s%> and it shall be that the man <S%H376><s%> whom Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> chooses, <S%H977><s%> he shall be holy. <S%H6918><s%> You have gone too far, <S%H7227><s%> you sons <S%H1121><s%> of Levi! <S%H3878><s%>"
Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Korah, <S%H7141><s%> "Hear <S%H8085><s%> now, <S%H1121><s%> you sons of Levi! <S%H3878><s%>

Is it a small thing <S%H4592><s%> to you, <S%H430><s%> that the God of Israel <S%H3478><s%> has separated <S%H914><s%> you from the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> to bring you near <S%H7126><s%> to himself, <S%H5647><s%> to do the service <S%H5656><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> of Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> and to stand <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the congregation <S%H5712><s%> to minister to them; <S%H8334><s%>

and that he has brought you near, <S%H7126><s%> and all your brothers <S%H251><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Levi <S%H3878><s%> with you? <S%H1245><s%> and do you seek the priesthood also? <S%H3550><s%>

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> you and all your company <S%H5712><s%> are gathered together <S%H3259><s%> against Yahweh: <S%H3068><s%> and Aaron, <S%H175><s%> what is he that you murmur against him? <S%H3885><s%>"

Moses <S%H4872><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> to call <S%H7121><s%> Dathan <S%H1885><s%> and Abiram, <S%H48><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Eliab; <S%H446><s%> and they said, <S%H559><s%> "We won't <S%H5927><s%> come up:

is it a small thing <S%H4592><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> you have brought us up <S%H5927><s%> out of a land <S%H776><s%> flowing <S%H2100><s%> with milk <S%H2461><s%> and honey, <S%H1706><s%> to kill <S%H4191><s%> us in the wilderness, <S%H4057><s%> but you must also <S%H8323><s%> make <S%H8323><s%> yourself a prince over us? <S%H8323><s%>

Moreover <S%H637><s%> you haven't <S%H935><s%> brought us into a land <S%H776><s%> flowing <S%H2100><s%> with milk <S%H2461><s%> and honey, <S%H1706><s%> nor given <S%H5414><s%> us inheritance <S%H5159><s%> of fields <S%H7704><s%> and vineyards: <S%H3754><s%> will you put out <S%H5365><s%> the eyes <S%H5869><s%> of these men? <S%H582><s%> We won't <S%H5927><s%> come up."

Moses <S%H4872><s%> was very <S%H3966><s%> angry, <S%H2734><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> "Don't <S%H6437><s%> respect their offering: <S%H4503><s%> I have not taken <S%H5375><s%> one <S%H259><s%> donkey <S%H2543><s%> from them, <S%H7489><s%> neither have I hurt one of them. <S%H259><s%>"

Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Korah, <S%H7141><s%> "You and all your company <S%H5712><s%> go before <S%H6440><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> you, <S%H175><s%> and they, and Aaron, tomorrow: <S%H4279><s%>

and each man <S%H376><s%> take <S%H3947><s%> his censer, <S%H4289><s%> and put <S%H5414><s%> incense <S%H7004><s%> on them, <S%H376><s%> and each man bring <S%H7126><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> his censer, <S%H4289><s%> two hundred <S%H3967><s%> fifty <S%H2572><s%> censers; <S%H4289><s%> you also, <S%H175><s%> and Aaron, each <S%H376><s%> his censer. <S%H4289><s%>"

They each <S%H376><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> his censer, <S%H4289><s%> and put <S%H5414><s%> fire <S%H784><s%> in them, <S%H7760><s%> and laid incense <S%H7004><s%> thereon, <S%H5975><s%> and stood at the door <S%H6607><s%> of the Tent <S%H168><s%> of Meeting <S%H4150><s%> with Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron. <S%H175><s%>

Korah <S%H7141><s%> assembled <S%H6950><s%> all the congregation <S%H5712><s%> against them to the door <S%H6607><s%> of the Tent <S%H168><s%> of Meeting: <S%H4150><s%> and the glory <S%H3519><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> appeared <S%H7200><s%> to all the congregation. <S%H5712><s%>
Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses <S%H4872><s%> and to Aaron, <S%H175><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>
"Separate <S%H914><s%> yourselves from among <S%H8432><s%> this congregation, <S%H5712><s%> that I may consume <S%H3615><s%> them in a moment! <S%H7281><s%>"

They fell <S%H5307><s%> on their faces, <S%H6440><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "God, <S%H430><s%> the God <S%H410><s%> of the spirits <S%H7307><s%> of all flesh, <S%H1320><s%> shall one <S%H259><s%> man <S%H376><s%> sin, <S%H2398><s%> and will you be angry <S%H7107><s%> with all the congregation? <S%H5712><s%>"
Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

"Speak <S%H1696><s%> to the congregation, <S%H5712><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> <S%H5927><s%> 'Get away from around <S%H5439><s%> the tent <S%H4908><s%> of Korah, <S%H7141><s%> Dathan, <S%H1885><s%> and Abiram! <S%H48><s%>'"

Moses <S%H4872><s%> rose up <S%H6965><s%> and went <S%H3212><s%> to Dathan <S%H1885><s%> and Abiram; <S%H48><s%> and the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> followed <S%H3212><s%> him. <S%H310><s%>

He spoke <S%H1696><s%> to the congregation, <S%H5712><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "Depart, <S%H5493><s%> please, <S%H168><s%> from the tents of these wicked <S%H7563><s%> men, <S%H582><s%> and touch <S%H5060><s%> nothing of theirs, <S%H5595><s%> lest you be consumed in all their sins! <S%H2403><s%>"

So they went <S%H5927><s%> away from the tent <S%H4908><s%> of Korah, <S%H7141><s%> Dathan, <S%H1885><s%> and Abiram, <S%H48><s%> on every side: <S%H5439><s%> and Dathan <S%H1885><s%> and Abiram <S%H48><s%> came out, <S%H3318><s%> and stood <S%H5324><s%> at the door <S%H6607><s%> of their tents, <S%H168><s%> and their wives, <S%H802><s%> and their sons, <S%H1121><s%> and their little ones. <S%H2945><s%>

Moses <S%H4872><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "Hereby you shall know <S%H3045><s%> that Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> has sent <S%H7971><s%> me to do <S%H6213><s%> all these works; <S%H4639><s%> for they are not from my own mind. <S%H3820><s%>

If these men die <S%H4191><s%> the common death <S%H4194><s%> of all men, <S%H120><s%> or if they be visited <S%H6485><s%> after the visitation <S%H6486><s%> of all men; <S%H120><s%> then Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> hasn't <S%H7971><s%> sent me.

But if Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> make <S%H1254><s%> a new thing, <S%H1278><s%> and the ground <S%H127><s%> open <S%H6475><s%> its mouth, <S%H6310><s%> and swallow them up, <S%H1104><s%> with all that appertain to them, <S%H3381><s%> and they go down alive <S%H2416><s%> into Sheol; <S%H7585><s%> then you shall understand <S%H3045><s%> that these men <S%H582><s%> have despised <S%H5006><s%> Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>"
It happened, <S%H3615><s%> as he made an end of speaking <S%H1696><s%> all these words, <S%H1697><s%> that the ground <S%H127><s%> split apart that was under them; <S%H1234><s%>

and the earth <S%H776><s%> opened <S%H6605><s%> its mouth, <S%H6310><s%> and swallowed them up, <S%H1104><s%> and their households, <S%H1004><s%> and all the men <S%H120><s%> who appertained to Korah, <S%H7141><s%> and all their goods. <S%H7399><s%>

So they, <S%H3381><s%> and all that appertained to them, went down alive <S%H2416><s%> into Sheol: <S%H7585><s%> and the earth <S%H776><s%> closed <S%H3680><s%> on them, <S%H6><s%> and they perished from among <S%H8432><s%> the assembly. <S%H6951><s%>
All Israel <S%H3478><s%> that were around <S%H5439><s%> them fled <S%H5127><s%> at their cry; <S%H6963><s%> for they said, <S%H559><s%> "Lest the earth <S%H776><s%> swallow us up! <S%H1104><s%>"

Fire <S%H784><s%> came forth <S%H3318><s%> from Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> and devoured <S%H398><s%> the two hundred <S%H3967><s%> fifty <S%H2572><s%> men <S%H376><s%> who offered <S%H7126><s%> the incense. <S%H7004><s%>
Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

"Speak <S%H559><s%> to Eleazar <S%H499><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%> the priest, <S%H3548><s%> that he take up <S%H7311><s%> the censers <S%H4289><s%> out <S%H996><s%> of the burning, <S%H8316><s%> and scatter <S%H2219><s%> the fire <S%H784><s%> yonder; <S%H1973><s%> for they are holy, <S%H6942><s%>

even the censers <S%H4289><s%> of these sinners <S%H2400><s%> against their own lives; <S%H5315><s%> and let them be made <S%H6213><s%> beaten <S%H7555><s%> plates <S%H6341><s%> for a covering <S%H6826><s%> of the altar: <S%H4196><s%> for they offered <S%H7126><s%> them before <S%H6440><s%> Yahweh; <S%H3068><s%> therefore they are holy; <S%H6942><s%> and they shall be a sign <S%H226><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>"

Eleazar <S%H499><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> the bronze <S%H5178><s%> censers, <S%H4289><s%> which those who were burnt <S%H8313><s%> had offered; <S%H7126><s%> and they beat <S%H7554><s%> them out for a covering <S%H6826><s%> of the altar, <S%H4196><s%>

to be a memorial <S%H2146><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> to the end that <S%H834><s%> no stranger, <S%H376><s%> who isn't <S%H2233><s%> of the seed of Aaron, <S%H175><s%> comes near <S%H7126><s%> to burn <S%H6999><s%> incense <S%H7004><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Yahweh; <S%H3068><s%> that he not be as Korah, <S%H7141><s%> and as his company: <S%H5712><s%> as Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to him by <S%H3027><s%> Moses. <S%H4872><s%>

But on the next day <S%H4283><s%> all the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> murmured <S%H3885><s%> against Moses <S%H4872><s%> and against Aaron, <S%H175><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "You have killed <S%H4191><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%>'s people! <S%H5971><s%>"

It happened, <S%H5712><s%> when the congregation was assembled <S%H6950><s%> against Moses <S%H4872><s%> and against Aaron, <S%H175><s%> that they looked <S%H6437><s%> toward the Tent <S%H168><s%> of Meeting: <S%H4150><s%> and behold, <S%H6051><s%> the cloud covered <S%H3680><s%> it, <S%H3519><s%> and the glory of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> appeared. <S%H7200><s%>
Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> came <S%H935><s%> to the <S%H6440><s%> front of the Tent <S%H168><s%> of Meeting. <S%H4150><s%>
Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

"Get away <S%H7426><s%> from among <S%H8432><s%> this congregation, <S%H5712><s%> that I may consume <S%H3615><s%> them in a moment! <S%H7281><s%>" They fell <S%H5307><s%> on their faces. <S%H6440><s%>

Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Aaron, <S%H175><s%> "Take <S%H3947><s%> your censer, <S%H4289><s%> and put <S%H5414><s%> fire <S%H784><s%> from off <S%H6440><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%> in it, <S%H7760><s%> and lay incense <S%H7004><s%> on it, <S%H3212><s%> and carry it quickly <S%H4120><s%> to the congregation, <S%H5712><s%> and make atonement <S%H3722><s%> for them; <S%H7110><s%> for wrath has gone out <S%H3318><s%> from Yahweh! <S%H3068><s%> The plague <S%H5063><s%> has begun. <S%H2490><s%>"

Aaron <S%H175><s%> did <S%H3947><s%> as Moses <S%H4872><s%> said, <S%H1696><s%> and ran <S%H7323><s%> into the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the assembly; <S%H6951><s%> and behold, <S%H5063><s%> the plague has begun <S%H2490><s%> among the people: <S%H5971><s%> and he put <S%H5414><s%> on the incense, <S%H7004><s%> and made atonement <S%H3722><s%> for the people. <S%H5971><s%>
He stood <S%H5975><s%> between the dead <S%H4191><s%> and the living; <S%H2416><s%> and the plague <S%H4046><s%> was stayed. <S%H6113><s%>

Now those who died <S%H4191><s%> by the plague <S%H4046><s%> were fourteen <S%H702><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and seven <S%H7651><s%> hundred, <S%H3967><s%> besides those who died <S%H4191><s%> about the matter <S%H1697><s%> of Korah. <S%H7141><s%>
Aaron <S%H175><s%> returned <S%H7725><s%> to Moses <S%H4872><s%> to the door <S%H6607><s%> of the Tent <S%H168><s%> of Meeting: <S%H4150><s%> and the plague <S%H4046><s%> was stayed. <S%H6113><s%>
